scripts.build:js: rm -rf dist && prettier --write "src/**/*.ts" && ng build --output-hashing none --named-chunks=true && npm run build:module
scripts.build-prod:js: rm -rf dist && prettier --write "src/**/*.ts" && ng build --configuration=production --output-hashing none --named-chunks=true --output-path=dist/production && npm run build:module production
scripts.build-dev:js: rm -rf dist && prettier --write "src/**/*.ts" && ng build --configuration=dev --output-hashing none --named-chunks=true --output-path=dist/dev && npm run build:module dev
